name: bot-tester
description: Easily test bots made with the bot builder framework
author: Matt Schwartz <mattschwartz310@gmail.com>

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run cleanBuild && npm run test && npm run buildTypeDocs
scripts.cleanBuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run testMocha && npm run testAva
scripts.testAva: npm run removeTranspiledAvaTests && tsc -p ./avaTsConfig.json && ava test/**/*.ava.spec.js
scripts.buildTypeDocs: yarn cleanBuild && rm -rf docs && typedoc --excludeNotExported --out docs --hideGenerator src/BotTester.ts --module commonjs --gaID UA-105358964-1 --readme none && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.coverage: npm run coverageTests && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | node_modules/.bin/coveralls
scripts.coverageTests: yarn testAva && nyc node_modules/.bin/_mocha --require source-map-support/register --require node_modules/ts-node/register test/**/*.mocha.spec.ts
